original_title: A Kaleidoscope of Meaning: Colour in Don't Look Now
overview: New featurette, David Cronenberg, cinematographer Anthony B. Richomond, and professor Sarah Street (University of Bristol), amongst others, discuss the use of color in Don't Look Now as well as the manner in which it affects the film's tone and atmosphere
title: A Kaleidoscope of Meaning: Colour in Don't Look Now
